sentences.en: "I love you," he said. — "Whatever that means," she said.
sentences.cn: 他说：“我爱你。”——她说：“你懂什么是爱吗？”

sentences.en: "Whatever is that row?" she demanded. "Pop festival," he answered.
sentences.cn: “那闹哄哄的究竟是在做什么？”她问道。“是流行音乐节，”他回答说。

sentences.en: Ensure that whatever you gain now will be for keeps.
sentences.cn: 确保你现在所获得的一切永远不会失去。

sentences.en: Help yourself to whatever you want.
sentences.cn: 请随意。

sentences.en: I was allowed to do whatever I wanted with my life.
sentences.cn: 我可以自由支配自己的生活。

sentences.en: I've always found him clued-up on whatever he was talking about.
sentences.cn: 我一直都觉得他对自己谈论的任何事情都了如指掌。

sentences.en: It's an interesting scientific phenomenon, but of no practical use whatever.
sentences.cn: 这是一种有趣的科学现象，但没什么实用价值。

sentences.en: She has shown no interest whatever in anything scientific.
sentences.cn: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.en: They're keenly aware that whatever they decide will set a precedent.
sentences.cn: 他们深知无论他们的决定是什么，都将开创先例。

sentences.en: This is just a stupid argument that has nothing whatever to do with your job.
sentences.cn: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

sentences.en: This means that whatever you develop with these two libraries does not have to be open source, but can be proprietary.
sentences.cn: 这意味着，无论您使用这两个库开发什么软件，该软件不必是开放源码的，可以是专有的。

sentences.en: use chopped herbs, nuts, garlic, or whatever.
sentences.cn: 使用剁碎的草药、坚果、大蒜，或其他类似的东西。

sentences.en: use chopped herbs, nuts, garlic, or whatever.
sentences.cn: 使用剁碎的草药、坚果、大蒜，或其他类似的东西。

sentences.en: We will do whatever is necessary to stop them.
sentences.cn: 我们要采取一切必要措施去阻止他们。

sentences.en: Whatever doubts he might have had about Ingrid were all over now.
sentences.cn: 他对英格丽德可能存有的疑虑现在全都烟消云散了。

sentences.en: Whatever I suggest, he always disagrees.
sentences.cn: 无论我提什么建议，他总是不同意。

sentences.en: Whatever is hidden is harmful (hence revelation equals security).
sentences.cn: 任何隐藏的东西都是有害的（所以披露就等于安全）。

sentences.en: Whatever its obscurities, the poem was clear on at least one count.
sentences.cn: 这首诗再怎么晦涩，至少有一点是清楚的。

sentences.en: Whatever the majority decided I was prepared to go along with.
sentences.cn: 只要是多数人的决定我都愿意服从。

sentences.en: Whatever the outcome, it's going to be one hell of a fight.
sentences.cn: 不管结果如何，这都会是场艰苦的战斗。

sentences.en: Whatever troubles arise, we'll have peace of mind amidst seeming chaos.
sentences.cn: 无论出现什么样的麻烦，我们都会在貌似混乱的情形中保持平和的心态。

sentences.en: Whatever you want to chat about, we'll do it tonight.
sentences.cn: 不管你想聊些什么，我们今晚聊个够。

trans.tran_cn: 一点儿都（不），什么都（没有），不管发生什么
trans.tran_en: used to emphasize a negative statement

trans.tran_cn: 任何（事物），无论什么，不管什么
任何，每一，无论什么，不管什么，无所谓
任何，每一，无论什么，不管什么，无所谓
trans.tran_en: any or all of the things that are wanted, needed, or possible
